title: Employee Tracker
description: This is a simple employee tool used to track and take the average of the salaries.

title: Taskboard Tracker
description: A Kanban style task tracker that allows for teams to manage project tasks.

title: Note Taker
description: A note taker that allows for offline sync. Take notes while you are on the go whether you are connected to the web or not - your notes will be saved.

title: Blog Start-Up
description: I started a blog page that allows for a free space to write down what comes to mind included with a darkmode/lightmode switch. This is in a olympic theme.

title: Brew Bound
description: This is a web application that helps connect Breweries and People find eachother.

title: Passpour
description: This is a web applicaiton that acts like a personal tracker and journal for your personal whiskey tastes.
